message: Let's split it fairly, 60/40.  I think it's a good starting point.
Your split seems unfair to me, considering the inflation. I need a bit more to make it worthwhile.  This is my counter offer.
Let's try to find a middle ground. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I also need to get a fair share. How about 55/45?
Time is running out, Alice!  This is my final offer. It's more than fair considering the shrinking pot.
